title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Yes yesrterday the powell and yellen sneaked in the Fed back door they turned on the lights and printer.So Fed have secret hole to supply markets with money.While everybody waiting for Crisis the fed secretly printing money while btc goes to ATH everybody waiting for Crisis.A lot shorts Will get liqutated over and over again.Shorts money will be used again to buy up markets and while everybody saying now it must come down it cant go any higher the Market keeps going new ATH again and again news off course stay quiet and once BTC back to 60k then we hear news like" garling House might win" Biden might approve btc" europe ecb considering shiba as new reserve currency or russia might CBDC ... bla blah.But we been told that there is more printing lol but secretly Fed do it they just dont tell you this time becouse then you dont buy you wait crash and you keep waiting until those who been waiting Will be the ones who fomo in from the ATH prices. And when Market ATH then news like binance got hacked or russia ban it India ban btc lol Same old tricks people fall for it.So yellen and powellworking in the night got a pallets of paper and secretly printing money.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Print first before putting it on the news and they also do it at night right? Quoteeurope ecb considering shiba as new reserve currencyLove it! All hail Lord Shib!You really have your way of foreseeing things that are to come. But Shib is too much.Printing again is indeed very likely. It seems like a China vs US war is about to happen in SCS and this balloon is just a match stick. Time to pump up markets and what traders are looking into is the gold but just BTC.
